name: Castelli Endurance 3 Bibshorts - Men's
description: Technical bibshorts for long-distance road riders who make comfort a priority. The Progetto X2 seat pad is all about being kind to your skin, and respectful of your anatomy in the saddle. The resilient stretch fabric provides optimum muscle support and feels dry in nearly all conditions.Main fabric is nylon and spandex, designed to support your muscles.Mesh panel is a polyester and spandex blend.Bib strap are engineered to be comfortable on a wide range of body types.Ergonomic paneled construction with flat-lock stitching to eliminate bulk and chafing.Progetto X2 Air seat pad includes a seamless skin care layer with a bacteriostatic layer that adapts to the shape of your body without any folds in the fabric. Multi-density foam and perforated viscous comfort inserts under highly sensitive areas.GIRO3 leg grippers lay flat.
